Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • SmoothMover
        • Collider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, Planet
    public abstract class Collider
extends SmoothMover
    Parent class for all objects that need to collide with each other in a rigid body physics system.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Emerson Coskey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Collider()
      Default Collider object, with default radius and mass, and material GRASS.
      Collider​(double radius, double mass, Material material)
      Creates a collider with specified radius, mass, and material.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getInvMass()
      Returns the inverse mass of the Collider.
      double getMass()
      Returns the mass of the Collider.
      Material getMaterial()
      Returns the material of the Collider.
      double getRadius()
      Returns the radius of the Collider.
      double getRestitution()
      Returns of restitution of the Collider.
